about_the_game:
Game description

Game Background:
After the last successful capture of the group of demon spirits sealed in the ancient scrolls, the defiant women have started a new way of evil, using beauty and illusion to lure people into the painting and then seal them completely in this, causing the world to fall into chaos again. As the guardian of the scrolls, you have to work harder this time to reseal the demon spirits in the scrolls, maintain the normal order of humans and demon spirits, and reach a perfect harmony.
But always remember to be careful, they are not as easy to get along with as they seem!
Game description:
Players use the demon refining pot to successfully attach the naughty demon spirits to the ancient scrolls to win and successfully unlock and collect different types of beautiful demon spirits.
Use the left mouse button to control the demon refining pot to make it bounce reasonably and successfully repel enemies.
Game Features
In the game, you will experience.
- Strong oriental features
- Interesting and difficult game levels
- 10 CGs to get
- New animated vertical drawing
- One click to skip

Character list

The setting of the demon spirit: The water is like a hibiscus, she always acts gentle and understanding, very sweet

The setting of the demon spirit: amazingly beautiful, but... Maybe beauty always has a little twist to it

The setting of the demon spirit: she is white as if she can glow, and has a pair of talking eyes

About us


Hello, we are Lovely Game, desire, throbbing, we are eager to give you the purest romance.
Because we want to provide you with a more convenient gaming experience, we have now launched the official Lovely Games website, so you can get our latest information anytime, anywhere, and if you encounter any problems in the game, you can also choose to raise them in the community F&Q discussion or the official steam group~.
Thanks for the love.
